attributes.action: Keep the hair and beauty industry open in tier 3 restrictions for covid 19
attributes.additional_details: Since the hair and beauty industry opened in July we have all followed strict guidelines and have kept the transmission rate of covid extremely low please keep these businesses open. we have proved we are covid secure and we are more essential than you know for peoples mental health.
attributes.background: Make sure the hair and beauty industry can remain open in tier 3 covid 19 local lockdown restrictions

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554478
